name: Priscilla
title: Maid of Steel

uniqueWeapon.name: Tumultuous Dance, Excilius
effect: When attacking the enemy with 'Vital Strike' or 'Turbulent Dance', per every hit enemy, corresponding skill's cooldown is reduced by 1 sec and ATK Spd is increased by 50 for 5 sec. ATK Spd boost can be stacked up to 10 times max.

When attacking the enemy with 'Vital Strike' or 'Turbulent Dance', per every hit enemy, corresponding skill's cooldown is reduced by 1.2 sec and ATK Spd is increased by 50 for 5 sec. ATK Spd boost can be stacked up to 10 times max.

When attacking the enemy with 'Vital Strike' or 'Turbulent Dance', per every hit enemy, corresponding skill's cooldown is reduced by 1.4 sec and ATK Spd is increased by 50 for 5 sec. ATK Spd boost can be stacked up to 10 times max.

When attacking the enemy with 'Vital Strike' or 'Turbulent Dance', per every hit enemy, corresponding skill's cooldown is reduced by 1.7 sec and ATK Spd is increased by 50 for 5 sec. ATK Spd boost can be stacked up to 10 times max.

When attacking the enemy with 'Vital Strike' or 'Turbulent Dance', per every hit enemy, corresponding skill's cooldown is reduced by 2 sec and ATK Spd is increased by 50 for 5 sec. ATK Spd boost can be stacked up to 10 times max.

When attacking the enemy with 'Vital Strike' or 'Turbulent Dance', per every hit enemy, corresponding skill's cooldown is reduced by 2.5 sec and ATK Spd is increased by 50 for 5 sec. ATK Spd boost can be stacked up to 10 times max.

soulWeapon.advancement0: Summons the soul of Tumultuous Dance, Excilius for 12 sec, increasing ATK of self and the ally with the highest ATK by 40%, and Crit DMG by 40%. Additionally grants immunity to CC effect to an ally with the highest ATK.
soulWeapon.advancement1: Reduces Skill Activation Requirements by 4 sec.
soulWeapon.advancement2: For the duration of Skill, increases DMG dealth of the ally with the highest ATK by 30%.

skillInfo.name: Vital Strike
skillInfo.description: Deals ??? P.DMG to frontal enemies in range and stuns them for 1 sec. This attack always inflicts a Crit Hit.

skills.light: Stun duration is increased by 2 sec.
skills.dark: No longer Crits unconditionally, and Crit DMG is increased by 150%.

skillInfo.name: Coordination
skillInfo.description: For 20 sec, places Priscilla and an ally with the highest ATK in 'Coordination' state, and dispels Negative Effects. Priscilla and the ally in Coordination State get an ATK boost equal to 15% of Priscilla's ATK + ???.

skills.dark: While in Co-Op state, auto attacks increase the target's received DMG from all sources by 30%.

skillInfo.name: Turbulent Dance
skillInfo.description: Deals ??? P.DMG to nearby enemies in a circular range and draws them towards herself. If activated while in the 'Coordination' state, hit enemies take 30% extra P.DMG and M. DMG for 10 sec.

skills.light: Upon a Crit hit, cooldown is reduced by 10%.
skills.dark: When there is only 1 enemy, DMG is increased by 100%.

profile.likes: Comrades in arms, her lady, cute outfits for her lady

background.story: A former officer of Orvelia's armed forces. After a failed attempt to reveal the corruption of military leaders, she was driven out from her position. Wanting to conceal their corruption, the military leaders constantly sent out assassins to eliminate her. The long and lonely fight was beginning to take its toll on her, physically and mentally. One day, the aristocratic von Daphnel family offered her protection in exchange for her service. She accepted, and has been working as Aisha's maid in the Tower of Sage ever since. To this day, she faithfully carries out her duties as a maid bodyguard. However, she sends all her payments to an undisclosed recipient.

itemIntroductions.weapon: During her military career, Priscilla felled countless enemies with her halberd. Although the halberd fell into a state of disrepair following her retirement, it was later resurrected as Exilius. This upgrade was a part of the order sent to Annette to create Mahitra for Aisha. This razor-sharp and incredibly durable new weapon even has the magical power to draw its enemies in. Those who have seen Priscilla slaughtering her Demon foes using this halberd claim that it was like watching an unstoppable storm.
treasures: A weight attached to the bottom of Exilius's grip. It provides Priscilla with better balance, allowing for more stable, precise attacks. When Annette enhanced her halberd into Exilius, she replaced its weight, too. Through Technomagical enhancement, the hardness of the weight was significantly increased with an upgrade that allows her to perform attacks with high precision.

Aisha's favorite ceramic tea cups that Priscilla has ready at all times. Luxurious tea cups made from the best clay of the eastern continent across the sea. It's mostly used for tea time with Aisha, but it is also used when using Coordination with Priscilla.

The first magic tool made by a wizard of Purple. The first gift that Aisha gave. Aisha created this magic tool because she felt bad that Priscilla used up so much power when using Turbulent Dance. The Mana Stone of Gravity relieves the pressure from the body when using Turbulent Dance, and it increases its effect.

A halberd that Priscilla used for practice. The storm of war started from this shabby old spear. She would take it out occasionally to be reminded of her training days. This is how she could always stay true to his way of life, protecting her Lady against all harms.
